### Background 
Millions of developers and companies build, ship, and maintain their software on GitHub â€” the largest and most advanced development platform in the world. At the eScience center GitHub is the main instrument used during the development of all projects, as an RSE at the center you will be using GitHub day in day out in your work. It is thus crucial that you learn the basics of GitHub as soon as possible to become operational and effective.
